name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7, Puyang, Henan. The houses in Xingfuli community have been built, but the developer has delayed the workers' wages. The workers held a banner that read "Long live the Communist Party, Xingfuli community, return my hard-earned money" to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 2, Bozhou, Anhui. The Zhongcheng Times Mansion building was delayed for one year and the owner cried loudly on the roof: I am so angry, no one responded when I called, and the special police comforted him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 2, a video titled "The Communist Party of China seeks happiness for the people" was met with collective sarcasm from 100,000 netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Linzhou Citizens Contribute
In recent days, fights have been happening every day in Linzhou, Anyang City, Henan Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Due to too many recent incidents in Shenyang, people in Shenyang began to perform various "Tiexi jokes" on Douyin

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 6, China National Grain and Oils Corporation responded for the first time to the mixed use of edible oil, gasoline and diesel tankers, saying that it would learn from it.
This major accident, which lasted for many years and affected the food health and safety of 1.4 billion people, did not result in an apology, a recall, compensation, or punishment of the responsible person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Yueyang, Hunan. A disaster victim from Tuanzhou Township, Huarong District, posted a video saying that because many people entered the resettlement site yesterday to eat and drink, and some even drove tricycles to transport relief supplies, the resettlement site was closed today and required ID cards to enter. However, many disaster victims did not have time to bring their ID cards when they were transferred, resulting in the real disaster victims being stranded outside the door and unable to enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 7, a disaster victim from Tuanzhou Township posted a video complaining about too many mosquitoes at the resettlement site. The video showed a classroom filled with beds. In the official media reports, the interviewees were all smiling and satisfied with the resettlement site.
To this, netizens responded: It’s different from what was posted in the news. In the official video of eating yesterday, everyone was eating with a smile on their face, and they had long forgotten that their homes were flooded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7, Yueyang, Hunan. A disaster victim at the Huarong County Technical School resettlement site posted a video of his lunch at the resettlement site. The video showed a fish, some vegetables and gourd fried with meat, a small box of yogurt, and a pot of seaweed egg drop soup.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 6, Yueyang, Hunan. In Tuanzhou Township, Huarong County, most of the residents have been relocated, and the streets that were once bustling with traffic have now become deserted.
As of now, one of the videos has been deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: What do you think of Pingjiang’s announcement that the disaster situation is unprecedented and that it is accepting donations from the public?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"People's hearts burst"
On CCTV's live broadcast of the Dongting Lake breach, netizens flooded the screen with inquiries about the whereabouts of the 8.5 billion yuan levee reinforcement project funds from a year ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: However, the media refuted the rumor earlier, saying that the Tuanzhou embankment breach was not within the scope of the 8.5 billion embankment reinforcement project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Water conditions in Zhengzhou, Henan on July 8.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7, Shenyang, Liaoning. The "Sunshine 100" building was unfinished, and the owners were forced to live in unfinished buildings and were evicted by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 8, Zhengzhou, Henan. Netizens posted a video saying "After the 720 incident, there are no cars in the Beijing-Guangzhou Tunnel and no one dares to go in"
https://t.co/UQKJseZibN

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 7, the Yan'an Municipal Education Bureau reported the student falling from a building:
The student was unwilling to participate in group activities, and the deputy head of the grade and the deputy director of the Moral Education Department criticized and educated him in an inappropriate way and with inappropriate words. Yan'an Middle School decided to remove the two teachers from their posts for investigation.
https://t.co/wl2SdBYKTq

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 1, Guilin, Guangxi. The sign of a hardware store was removed, and the owner questioned the urban management: You kicked me out with a few shields, what law did you violate? You have to tell me. You stand here for a day, and I have to pay taxes to pay your wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/9qQaoky2T6

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Forbidden memories

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 7, Linyi, Shandong. Police rescued a citizen trapped in the water from his car. Afterwards, the owner of the red car questioned the police for posing to save people in the circle of friends.
On July 8, the official response said that the rescued person was near the vehicle, "the water level rose and he was trapped there", but it was still questioned by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contributions
Previous government leaders at the flood site:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Anxi County in Fujian Province issued a notice to clear out non-staff teachers. The notice mentioned that as of August 31, all non-staff teachers employed by the county and the school whose contracts expired will be announced in advance that their employment contracts will not be renewed.
In response, a netizen replied: Downsizing + clearing out, won’t there be any way out for us normal school students?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7, Zhejiang. A man hit an old lady with his car, then broke down and cried, slapping himself repeatedly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Jining, Shandong, some residents complained on the government inquiry platform, saying that the payment window of Wenshang County Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital was designed to be low, causing patients or their families to bend over when paying.
https://t.co/tMroN6x77k

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen question: What is the current situation in Xiongan?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of July 8, some netizens discovered that the edible oil series of Jinding Taobao flagship store under Sinograin, such as sunflower oil, corn germ oil, olive oil, sesame oil, etc., had been removed from the shelves. The customer service responded that the warehouse was closed recently and would be put back on the shelves after a while. When asked whether the removal of edible oil from Jinding was related to the recent incident of Sinograin tank trucks mixing oil tanks, the customer service said that the specific reason was unclear.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 1, Shaanxi. On July 1, the founding day of the Communist Party of China, a second-generation red posted a video, reporting in his real name that he had defrauded Shaanxi Xianyang Bank of a loan of 10.7 million yuan by privately carving official seals, issuing false invoices, and making false statements.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Huzhou, Zhejiang. A video of a party oath was ridiculed by many netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 5, 2024, the Beijing Newspaper and Periodical Distribution Bureau of China Post issued an urgent notice, requiring the immediate suspension of delivery and retail of the 6th issue of People magazine in 2024, and its on-site destruction.
The reason is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Shaanxi. A patriotic netizen advised a supermarket owner to "only stock Wahaha and don't sell other brands, because he (other brands) has four major shareholders, three of whom are Japanese. You send him bullets every day to shoot us."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Inner Mongolia. A man posted a video saying that they were asked for wages outside the Public Security Bureau and were sprayed with pepper spray. The man said he dared not trust these people anymore and hoped that the relevant departments would intervene and deal with it. "We just asked for wages, but we were beaten like dogs."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 8, following Guangzhou, Changsha also announced a water price increase.
The first tier of residential water use was adjusted from 1.51 yuan/m³ to 1.9 yuan/m³.
Non-residential water use was adjusted from 2.37 yuan/m³ to 2.97 yuan/m³.
The price of special water supply was adjusted from 5.64 yuan/m³ to 7.92 yuan/m³.
The water supply price for joint-meter residential users who were not read by Changsha Water Supply Co., Ltd. was adjusted from 1.51 yuan/m³ to 2.19 yuan/m³.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV comments on the oil tanker incident: Such a makeshift team is killing consumers

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Previously, Hong Kong Satellite TV, which reported the incident, responded that the video had been removed from the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Xingtai, Hebei. Video shows that outside Guangzong Taihang Middle School, some parents held banners to protest their rights. According to one parent, these are junior high school parents who paid in advance. The former principal ran away with the money, and the parents came to the school to ask for a refund.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 22:30 on July 8, the 226-meter breach in Dongting Lake was sealed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As early as 2015, there were reports that many tank trucks in Hengyang, Yongzhou and other places in Hunan Province carried edible oil after being loaded with highly corrosive chemicals to their destinations.
After reporters collected evidence and reported it that year, traffic control and food safety departments in various places said that they had launched a thorough investigation in the province to crack down on illegal transportation and strictly investigate food safety hazards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 6, Tiexi District, Shenyang, Liaoning Province. The video showed large blood stains on the ground at a bus stop. A man was lying on the ground, his hands cuffed behind his back by the police.
 https://t.co/FbpvVaUSAy
